name: Jimmie WALLACE, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Wallace v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Jimmie WALLACE, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of April, 2005, probable jurisdic- ’ tion is noted; the order appealed is affirmed. The Motion For Summary Judgment is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
872 A.2d 1126
Jimmie WALLACE, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.
